results.title: Residual entropy in a model for the unfolding of single polymer chains

main_text_sample.first_500: The unfolding of polymers has been studied for many years. Recently, it became possible to investigate the stability of a single polymer against unfolding by applying a mechanical force to the end-point of the molecule. Tools like optical tweezers, atomic force microscopes and soft microneedles are used in this kind of experiments.
